name: Castle Light (Clyfdir)
description:
This is a small ( ca. 5 - 10 minutes) Light / Laser Puzzle Game.  You wake up in a dungeon of an abandoned fortress. Your only way to escape is to manipulate the incoming lasers so that they open the doors for you.

The game design is inspired by the Talos Principle and the two portal games.

This is just a prototype and and the purpose behind the project was mainly to learn the Unreal Engine. There was some story planned but didn't made it into the prototype. Maybe I'll work on that project and improve it furthet but for now this is it.
